column5: Just wondering if there are any walleye being caught with all this warm weather? I have some time off and I would like to get a bit of practice in before the fall run starts. I have heard they are out deep in Erie but i don't have enough boat for that.  Thanks

I am north of Guelph but I travel all over. The GRAC reservoirs are getting pretty low and the fish are boiled with this hot weather. Just looking to get out on some bigger water as I wait for the fall season to begin. I think the walleye and perch in Erie are still pretty far out, thinking of the Kawartha lakes for this week.
Been hitting eyes in 30 fow in Erie eastern basin.  Not many but getting them. Bill
There are walleyes in the grand but i have no idea how to go about targetting them.
I was out in 60 fow a week ago, marked some bait fish but not much else. I was told they are still @ 80 + feet. There must be some movement if you getting them in 30.
